reviews.comments:
Hermoso lugar, super tranquilo, para desconectarse de todo. El domo es súper cómodo, con todas las comodidades. Los anfitriones super atentos y muy amables. 
Definitivamente vamos a volver . Es increíble el lugar .

El lugar es un encanto. Cálido, impecable, espacioso, con una inmejorable vista, hermoso entorno. Carlos y Cinthya se mostraron super amables, muy predispuestos a dar una mano para hacer mejor nuestra estadía. Nos recibieron con mermeladas artesanales y pan casero. No puedo mas que agadecer y recomendar el lugar

Un lugar excelente, tando a la mañana com a la noche se respira mucha calma en todo el entorno, el domo increible, cálido, cómodo, totalmente equipado y muy atractivo en su diseño. Muy recomendable para conocerlo

Carlos y cinthya nos recibieron impecable. Son excelentes anfitriones. El domo es un sueño. Cómodo, impecablemente equipado y en un marco natural increíble. 100 x 100 recomendado.
Esperamos volver muy pronto!

Nuestra experiencia en el Domo fue muy gratificante. Cuando reservamos el lugar nos atrajo por ser bastante distinto a los demás. 
Íbamos con grandes expectativas y lejos de decepcionarnos, como suele ocurrir siempre que uno espera mucho de algo en especial, el Domo superó ampliamente esas expectativas.
Como Carlos no iba a estar nos puso en contacto con Graciela, que fue quien nos recibió y nos dio todas las indicaciones necesarias para nuestra estadía.
Al entrar, en plena sintonía con la hora de la merienda, nos esperaba un pan casero y unas mermeladas caseras de sauco y de frambuesa deliciosas que hacen ahí en la chacra. 
El Domo por dentro es muy acogedor. Si bien por fotos pareciera ser chico, no lo sentimos así cuando lo conocimos. Tiene todos los materiales necesarios para poder cocinar, el baño estaba muy limpio y la cama muy cómoda para dormir. El jacuzzi también aporta su parte para relajar el cuerpo luego de largas caminatas.
En fin, es un lugar de ensueño al que sin duda volveríamos de tener la posibilidad de volver a Lago Pueblo. 
Lo recomendamos.
El Domo es soñado, un paraíso al lado de la montaña, sin duda vamos a volver. Carlos y su flia son muy atentos, gracias!
Muy cordial la atención de Carlos y Silvia, estuvieron en cada detalle y cumplieron con todo lo que se ve y se ofrece en el servicio. Sólo quedan... ganas de volver! Gracias!

Vivo cerca en el bolsón y fui a quedarme una noche en el domo  para conocer un otro lugar y descansar. El domo  es bien hecho y cómodo, la familia muy agradable, jucuzzi maravilloso, y la onda de la chacra  muy tranquila. Espero que volver pronto! :)

El lugar es muy lindo, en una zona de chacras, conseguir frambuesas y frutillas es algo muy fácil. Carlos nos despertaba con el pan recién hecho. Fue todo 10 puntos y Carlos un gran anfitrión.
Espero volver

La experiencia en el domo fue maravillosa! Cintia fue una anfitriona muy querida. Nos gustó todo, principalmente el jacuzzi y el pan y dulces caseros del desayuno. El domo es muy cómodo y cálido, el paisaje es deslumbrante.

El domo está ubicado justo fuera del centro del pueblo Lago Puelo y dentro de una chacra familiar.  Muy bonito el lugar y los dueños son muy atentos.  La casa cuenta con todo lo necesario para una estadía cómoda y agradable.  Aun tienen un puesto pequeño con productos artesanales de su chacra a la venta.  Muy recomendable!

Carlos y Cinthia son excelentes anfitriones, super amables. Nuestra estancia en el Domo fue increíble, la cabaña es un lugar mágico que vale la pena visitar, muy confortable y con todos los detalles pensados para el huésped. 100% Recomendable!

Holaa Hermoso el Domo hecho totalmente con dedicacion y se nota  q hubo mucho sacrificio, pasamos espectacular, y lo disfrutamos mucho! Carlos ha sido muy amable y nos sorprendio con un pan cacero al llegar y sus ricas mermeladas!
Saludos!!

We arrived at "The Dome" a few minutes early and were somewhat surprised to find that it is located in an Carlos's front yard and next to a small parkig structure. Having seen the photo online, we assumed we'd be in an isolated field somewhere in Lago Puelo. Not to mention that the outside of the The Dome looked slightly run down, so my trepidation grew. However, the moment Carlos opened the front door - I knew that we had stumbled across an AirBnb gem!

The cabin was in impecable condition, complete with a loaf of homemade bread on the counter, coffee and milk at the ready, and homemade bath salts & soaps for our enjoyment in the hot tub. We enjoyed our one-night stay immensely and kept the winter chills away with 2 glorious dips in the hot tub. Carlos is clearly a hosting pro and had thought of many details that go above and beyond the call of duty. We're very thankful for a chance to enjoy this unique Patagonian getaway and would highly recommend it to other honeymooners and travelers looking for a cozy retreat from the world.
Loves this awesome place. Very different, really new and neat inside. Feels like a brand new cabin with luxury jacuzzi. Fantastic amenities. Highly recommend : )

The dome is amazing. Really upscale, great bed and pillows, and everything smelled like fresh lavender. Really great upscale accomodation. You're in Carlos's yard, and there's no shortage of animals -- I saw horses, tons of birds, his friendly cats and dogs. It's very quiet and secluded. Very cool experience.
Easy to find in a rural area just outside town.  Stayed for one night on my way to Bariloche.  Clean with good bread and eggs.  Can't go wrong with this place.

Le dôme est un vrai petit paradis où l'on y est accueilli avec une grande gentillesse et attentions.
L'extérieur donne sur les montagnes et l'intérieur est magnifique. La cuisine très bien équipée et le jaccuzzi un vrai bonheur.

Despite our late arrival, Carlos greeted us with a warm smile and directed us into our lovely Dome for the night.  The following morning, when we were better rested after a lovely night's sleep enjoying the clean country air, Carlos helped us plan our couple of days in Lago Puelo, including a visit to the artisanal fair in El Bolson, a swim in the lake, dinner out, an amazing horseback ride into the national park, and a sunset sail on a nearby lake.  We were provided with tasty breakfast food & drinks, many of which came from his small farm.  Carlos and his wife Cynthia could not have been more kind and welcoming - this is a perfect place for a couple looking for relaxation.
Excelente !!!!!! Ótimos anfitriões !
Super cosy place to stay near Lago Puelo! Very friendy host, we absolutely enjoyed it, as well as the home made breakfast! :)

Carlos and his family were fantastic hosts, very warm kind people. The pictures really don't do the eco dome and the surrounding views justice. The most tranquil place we have ever been and a real highlight of our 17 day honeymoon trip through Argentina.

This is what airbnb is all about. The dome was fantastic in every way -beautiful to look at, very comfortable and more than fulfilled our needs and expectations. Carlos and his wife generously provided lavender bath salts for the hot tub, jams and fresh bread for breakfast -all homemade on their lovely organic farm. Carlos himself was an excellent host -welcoming and picking us up from the bus station, providing bicycles for the day and always on hand if we had any questions. This is the BEST airbnb experience we have had to date.

If I could sum this up in two words, I would say: go there!

My girlfriend and I were looking for a calmer, less touristy place to stay around Bariloche, and were pretty excited when we found this place. El Bolsón has plenty of cabins for rent, but none are this unique. 
The dome was built by Carlos himself, and there are some photos and information about how and why it was built this way. It's quite spacious inside, with a small bathroom, kitchen, and everything we needed for a comfortable stay. I remember thinking how unappealing it was to stay in a boring square room after spending 4 nights in here.

It is located on a small farm, about a hundred meters from Carlos' house, so we felt like we had our privacy but were not too isolated in case we needed anything. The views outside were amazing, being in a fertile valley in between two beautiful mountain ranges. Carlos had also set up a small table and chairs outside and we had breakfast there in the mornings

The place is very close to Lago Puelo national park, which had amazing views and hikes, and it's also very close to mount Piltriquitron, where it's possible to hike to vista points for the valley below

To make things even better, Carlos and his family's hospitality were second to none. We were greeted with fresh home made bread that Carlos baked and marmelades made by his wife from their farm berries, and throughout our stay we enjoyed our small chats with them. They struck a perfect balance of checking in to make sure we didn't need anything, while also giving us our space and privacy. We couldn't have asked for more. 

We can't wait to go back. Thanks for everything, Carlos!

Tranquility Base - go before the secret's out!
Carlos and his family have created a little piece of paradise on their small farm (chacras) 1.5hrs south of Bariloche and 10 mins by car from Lago Puelo. 

The dome is even better than the photos portray - immaculately clean, everything and more than you might need from a self catered 5 star apartment! Great ensuite, wifi, kitchen area, flat screen TV and jacuzzi! Regardless of the exemplary finish and mod-cons the winning factor is the setting - absolute peace and quiet - you could lose yourself in the dome like we did for 3 days. Dark nights, sitting in the deck drinking Malbec and cooking a steak on the BBQ. Lazy breakfasts with fresh milk, home baked bread, and jams from the farm.

A real find - and definitely worth the detour south away from the crowds of bariloche for some real relaxation. Don't expect lots to do - maybe a spot of fly fishing or a walk at lago puelo half way to the South Pole at 45 degrees South! But really this place is about kicking back and reading a decent book and cooking your own meals. 

It's currently a well kept secret as mostly used by Argentinians in the peak season - but it won't be long before it tops the Trip Advisor rankings and well deserved!
